mapper.select: select (select department_name from departments where department_id = e.department_id ) department_name, sum(decode(unit, 2001, count, 0)) as "y2001", sum(decode(unit, 2002, count, 0)) as "y2002", sum(decode(unit, 2003, count, 0)) as "y2003", sum(decode(unit, 2004, count, 0)) as "y2004", sum(decode(unit, 2005, count, 0)) as "y2005", sum(decode(unit, 2006, count, 0)) as "y2006", sum(decode(unit, 2007, count, 0)) as "y2007", sum(decode(unit, 2008, count, 0)) as "y2008" from ( select department_id, to_char(hire_date, 'yyyy') unit, count(*) count from employees where department_id in ( select department_id from (select dense_rank() over(order by count desc) rank, department_id, count from (select department_id, count(*) count from employees group by department_id )) where rank <= 3 ) group by department_id, to_char(hire_date, 'yyyy') ) e group by department_id
